title: Isle Royale National Park: Places To Go
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Places To Go             Places To Go         A ranger greets visitors arriving on the Voyageur II ferry.     There are three main points of entry to Isle Royale National Park:  Houghton, Michigan (park's mainland headquarters)   Rock Harbor (on the northeast end of the island)   Windigo (on the southwest end of the island)   Â    Each has a visitor center and numerous services and amenities it offers.  From Rock Harbor or Windigo, Isle Royale's backcountry trails, campgrounds, docks, and anchorages can be reached.
